Arundhati Bhattacharya bụ onye ọrụ na ụlọ akụ India lara ezumike nka na onye bụ onye isi oche nke State Bank of India
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ ga-abụ onye isi oche nke State Bank of India
Na afọ 2016, e depụtara ya dị ka nwanyị otu n'ime nwanyị iri abụo na ise kachasị ike n'ụwa site na Forbes
Ọ bụ naanị ya bụ onye ndu ụlọ ọrụ India nke edepụtara na ndepụta ndị ndu ụwa kachasị ukwu nke Fortune na 26.
Na afọ  2018, ajụjụ ọnụ ya akpọrọ "Arundhati Bhattacharya: Ime SBI's First Women Chairperson" ka ebipụtara na Harvard Business Review Ascend Archived
A mụrụ Bhattacharya na ezinụlọ Bengali n'obodo Kolkata
Ọnọdụ nwata ya bu na Bokaro Steel City
Nna ya, Prodyut Kumar Mukherjee rụrụ ọrụ na Bokaro Steel Plant
Nna ya, Kalyani Mukherjee bụ onye ndụmọdụ homeopathy na Bokaro
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Xavier's School, Bokaro
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ Bekee na Calcutta's Lady Brabourne College wee gụọ kwa na Mahadum Jadavpur
Di ya, Pritimoy Bhattacharya onye ọkachamaraIIT Kharagpur
N'afọ 2016, Forbes kpọrọ ya nwanyị nke iri abụọ na ise kachasị ike n'ụwa, nke bụ oge mbụ ọ nọ na ndepụta ahụ
N'otu afọ ahụ, a họọrọ ya n'etiti FP Top 100 Global Thinkers site na akwụkwọ akụkọ Foreign Policy  Akpọrọ ya aha nwanyị nke anọ kachasị ike na Asia Pacific site na Fortune
Na 2017, akwụkwọ akụkọ India Today họọrọ ya na 19th n'ime ndị India 50 kachasị ike na ndepụta 2017

Oruru mgbe ekwesiri inye ya ezumike na onwa nke iri na afo 2016, mana enyere ya ndọtị ruo onwa nke iri na afọ 2017, ebido ya ebubo maka njikọta esemokwu nke ụlọ akụ ndị otu SBI ise na Bharatiya Mahila Bank, n'ihi nnukwu akụ na-adịghị arụ ọrụ (GNPAs) na-arị elu na pasent 73. ; ọchịchị dị ugbu a na-akwado njem ahụ site na Ụlọ Ọrụ Banks Board, bụ onye kwadoro mgbatị ya
Na afọ 2018 a kpọrọ ya onye ndu azụmaahịa nke afọ na onyinye nrite Asia
Arundhati Bhattacharya esonyela dị ka onye isi ndị ọzọ, 'onye nduzi nọọrọ onwe ya' nke Reliance Industries maka afọ ise malitere 17 October 2018.
N'afọ 2020, ewere ya dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi maka ngalaba nke Salesforce India, nnukwu ụwa na CRM
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ugbu a nke SWIFT India, akụkụ nke netwọk ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ
Bhattacharya weputara arụkwaghịm ya dị ka onye ntụzi aka nke CRISIL (ụlọ ọrụ nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ na-enye ọkwa, nyocha na ihe egwu na ọrụ ndụmọdụ amụma) dị irè na abalị iri na ise na onwa nke ano
Ahụrụ ya ka ona eso ndị ogu iwu ahịa na India dị ka onye isi oche na onye isi ala na abalị iri abuo na onwa nke anọ  dị ka ihe kpatara arụkwaghịm ahụ
Bhattacharya ga-akọ akụkọ nye Ulrik Nehammer, Onye isi njikwa APAC
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-abụghị onye isi na 'Reliance Industries Limited'.
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke ndi ana akpo 'Board of Governors of Indian Institute of Management, Sambalpur'
Amụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na Bhilai, ma mụọ na ngalaba 9 ụlọ akwụkwọ.
